sentences.english: Pays great attention to the form in this time poet to be elegant, strives for perfection to the poem skill.
sentences.chinese: 在这个时期诗人注重形式典雅，对诗艺精益求精。

sentences.english: Yoshikatsu heart so that she was always excellence, and strive to achieve top.
sentences.chinese: 好胜心让她不断地精益求精，努力做到最顶尖。

sentences.english: Delicate-fine in quality, pursue perfect and cast refinement out of detail.
sentences.chinese: 精工品质精益求精，在细节中铸就精致。

sentences.english: The design of Neoclassicism pursues perfectness in every project and case.
sentences.chinese: 紫金尚古设计追求每个项目，每个案例做到精益求精。

sentences.english: All the technologies involved need further refinement, but none are out of reach.
sentences.chinese: 所有的技术都需要精益求精，但确属已知范围。

sentences.english: Excelsior , I believe I can have made the clothing.
sentences.chinese: 精益求精，我相信我能把衣服做好。

sentences.english: G. bird's products are strictly completed by keeping improving each specific.
sentences.chinese: 吉祥鸟对制作的每一个细节都精益求精地严格完成。

sentences.english: Mastery denotes the pleasure of doing something that one is passionate about.
sentences.chinese: “精益求精”是指充满激情地去做某事所带来的愉悦。

sentences.english: Nursing shouldn' t be over - operational, but it should be excelsior.
sentences.chinese: 护理不能过度操作化，但要对操作精益求精。

sentences.english: Will Parker have time to be so fastidious?
sentences.chinese: 帕克会有时间如此精益求精吗？

sentences.english: The Kovan thinks much of technical development and is strict in craft.
sentences.chinese: 重视技术开发，对工艺要求精益求精。

sentences.english: Perfectionism – “He was also a person that believed in the precise detail of every step.
sentences.chinese: 他还是一个执着于每一步骤的细节都要精益求精的人。

sentences.english: Strives for perfection earnestly according to the abundant product, develops unceasingly, is unceasingly enterprising.
sentences.chinese: 依恳丰产品精益求精，不断开拓，不断进取。
